metadata.title: CVE-2017-14681 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The daemon in P3Scan 3.0_rc1 and earlier creates a p3scan.pid file afterdropping privileges to a non-root account, which might allow local users tokill arbitrary processes by leveraging access to this non-root account forp3scan.pid modification before a root script executes a "kill `cat/pathname/p3scan.pid`" command, as demonstrated by etc/init.d/p3scan.

criterions.comment: p3scan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
